interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 35.4 Inch Extra Long Silicone Back Scrubber for Shower, 2021 Updated Lengthen Back Scrubber Brush for Men and Women, Exfoliating Back Washer with Wall Hooks, Easy Clean, Comfortable Massage (Green 27.5in)
Review Date: 2020/09/20
Store: MAORULU
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '8.75 x 5.5 x 2.6 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '757173533773', 'Manufacturer': 'MAORULU'}
Review Text: I don't think this is doing anything. I've used it a couple times and doesn't feel like its doing its job. The bristles are way too soft. If you are itchy and can't reach your back then its great. But I wouldn't get this using it would clean my back.
Review Title: Too mild.
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Beast Blue Beard Oil with Organic Argan & Jojoba Oils, 1 fl oz Tame the Beast {'Liquid Volume': '1 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'Tame the Beast', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 FL OZ', 'Package Dimensions': '7.05 x 3.54 x 1.54 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '817662018546'} Out of all the beard oils the husband has used he says this one is the best. Its lightweight, moisturizing and the scent (which is excellent on its own) doesn't linger too long. I've tried other products from this line and they've all been great! 5/5 4 Pieces Glass Nail Shiner Crystal Nail Shine Buffer Polisher Crystal Glass Nano Nail File with Case for Natural Nails (Black Flat End) Mudder {'Material': 'Glass', 'Brand': 'Mudder', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 1.57 x 0.63 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} I don't understand the good reviews. This didn't work for me. It was uncomfortable to use and didn't do a good job. I feel like it did more damage than good. There's scratches on my nails, even if you use a lighter hand you don't see any results. Not for me. Winky Lux Double Matte Whip 24-Hour Waterproof Lipstick, Liquid Wet Lipstick for Long-Lasting Matte Lip Color, Hydrating Makeup with Vanilla and Avocado Oil to Lock in Moisture, 0.14 Oz, Cookie Winky Lux {'Brand': 'Winky Lux', 'Color': 'Cookie', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.65 x 0.65 x 4.28 inches; 0.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '859346006968'} If you have dry lips and you'd like still like to find a liquid lipstick that doesn't crack on your lips I'm afraid this isn't it. It dries out very quickly and it settles in my lines.
The shade of it is nice, I can imagine it looking beautiful on someone with deeper skin tone, I have brown skin but on me it looks unflattering. It does have a soft, non irritating scent which I like. Not for me unfortunately! Foot Peel Mask For Cracked Heels, Dead Skin & Calluses - Make Your Feet Baby Soft & Get a Smooth Skin, Removes & Repairs Rough Heels Monikahair {'UPC': '739515020639'} This does work but you gotta follow the instructions properly! It wont show any results immediately but over time I saw lots of dead skin shedding which was gross but also satisfying. It works! 35.4 Inch Extra Long Silicone Back Scrubber for Shower, 2021 Updated Lengthen Back Scrubber Brush for Men and Women, Exfoliating Back Washer with Wall Hooks, Easy Clean, Comfortable Massage (Green 27.5in) MAORULU {'Package Dimensions': '8.75 x 5.5 x 2.6 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '757173533773', 'Manufacturer': 'MAORULU'} I don't think this is doing anything. I've used it a couple times and doesn't feel like its doing its job. The bristles are way too soft. If you are itchy and can't reach your back then its great. But I wouldn't get this using it would clean my back. Too mild.
profile:
**User Profile Summary (Updated):**

- **Grooming Products:** The user maintains a strong preference for high-quality grooming solutions, focusing on effective, lightweight, and moisturizing formulations with subtle fragrances. They remain loyal to brands providing consistent quality but are increasingly scrutinizing their grooming routines for effectiveness.

- **Feedback and Ratings:** The user is discerning in evaluations, providing ratings that reflect their experiences. A recent interaction with a back scrubber illustrates their critical approach; they found the product underwhelming due to its excessive softness, suggesting it lacks the efficacy desired for more effective cleansing. This emphasis on performance continues to highlight their tendency to articulate both satisfaction and areas for improvement. Additionally, their past purchase of a matte liquid lipstick showed they prioritize effective solutions even when aesthetics are appealing.

- **Purchase Intent:** The user actively seeks products that guarantee a pleasant experience, ease of use, and effective results, all while favoring non-overpowering scents. Their recent assessments show an ongoing commitment to premium quality alongside a growing vigilance in evaluating efficacy across product categories, indicating an evolved and increasingly critical perspective on grooming products overall.

In summary, the user demonstrates a discerning and critical consumer approach, balancing their appreciation for quality with a demand for tangible results in product performance.
